  • Constructor Summary

    Player(char gamePiece)
    This method will initialize a Player giving them 12 game pieces and setting the game piece value to 12 for the Checkers game

  • Method Details

    • getGamePiece

      public char getGamePiece()
      This method will be used in the checkers logic file to gather the players piece, to ensure the player cannot move a different player's piece
      Returns:
      the char value associated with the player ('o' or 'x')
